item.title: Bbq Sauce
item.description: I really enjoy this bbq-sauce with pulled pork or as a glaze for spare-ribs. Ingredients Ketchup Worcester Sauce Mustard Vinegar Garlic powder Onion powder Salt, pepper and sugar to taste Cooking plan Put it all into a pan and stir over low heat. Go easy on the mustard and vinegar. ENJOY!
